channel.title: I found joy on Lemenio
channel.description: Recent content in I found joy on Lemenio

item.title: It's inside
item.description: Having been through a next darkness moment. Feel like I was missing out on something essential in my personalities. Anger, anxiety, sad, happy, all that emotion happens through plenty of events. Am I lying? Maybe.

item.title: Really is
item.description: Sometimes things go beyond our control. It’s just not that easy to keep a positive mindset during this period. Clueless and even a way to strive through, need more motivation.

item.title: Prepare isn't the case
item.description: Can’t denying the fact that ordering play a vital role in our life. It saves our life in the aspect of dedication. Which dedicated to the thing we actually fall in love with.

item.title: Speak less
item.description:
There’s always light in the darkness.

I always say “show them your empathy” as saying more than needed in every conversation. Including those people who are impatient when hearing. I was wrong.

item.title: Accept the imperfection
item.description: Starting to realize when we keep moving on and leave behind the perfectness of the result, we have more time for other activities. Spend too many time and focus on the quality may exhaust our ability to solve other problems on the daily basis.
